attributes.action: Brexit, we expect full sovereignty returned in leaving the EU. No collusion...
attributes.additional_details: We expect full and total removal from the EU.  We expect STRONG and absolute resolve to ensure the rights & freedoms of the British people are fully restored. Do not doubt our understanding of the implication of your actions. You have our mandate we expect delivery in full. Common law is our right and we insist it is maintained, along with our armed forces and our fishing waters. Do not accept any demands for money and would hope that you would insist in remuniration for our half of the assets.
attributes.background: During removing the UK fully from the EU. We the people wish to ensure that you as our representatives understand that, we do not consent to tying UK armed forces to the EU. You must not enshrine EU law into UK law we want our common law rights maintaining. Fishing waters to be fully repatriated..
